overview:
Kerry Munro is the Chief Operating Officer of Syncapse, a global leader in social technology.

Over the past 2 decades Kerry has been leading and advising organizations on how to experience hyper growth by leveraging consumer behaviour and demystifying technology as a means to connect with consumers, build a digital brand and increase revenues and shareholder value.

Most recently he was the head of Yahoo! Canada, where under his leadership he turned it from a floundering business and built it into the fastest growing and best performing business unit in Yahoo worldwide and the largest digital media company in Canada, achieving annual double/triple digit growth over his tenure.

Heâ€™s been an agent for change at leading tech companies including Bell Canada and AT&T and his entrepreneurial spirit led him to start several new ventures including, most recently, Digital Insights, where he provides strategic counsel to Fortune 500 brands and corporations who want to leverage digital and social media technology to create long standing profitable connections with consumers, outpace their competition and improve their business fundamentals and performance.

Kerry has been recognized as one of Canadaâ€™s top influential marketers and advises executives, boards, hyper growth companies and charitable organizations and is a frequently sought after contributor to national news organizations.
